overview: Independent horror anthology. In "The Abduction of Jordan", a young man tells 3 crazy stories to his kidnappers in order to stay alive. In "The House on King Road", a woman discovers the terrifying truth that lurks within her own home. In "The Request", an unfortunate individual summons a demon to help solve his problems. Finally, in "The Sitter", a mother leaves her child with a woman who has much more disturbing things on her mind.
tagline: How Well Do You Know The Person Who Lives Next Door?
title: Hometown
